title: buffer overflow bug
extract: Definition of 'Buffer Overflow' Definition: Buffer overflow occurs when a program tries to store more data in a temporary storage area than it can hold. ... Description: Buffer overflow occurs when data that is written to buffer ends up corrupting data values in memory addresses as well.Jan 25, 2016
